document_data.name: Azazabus
document_data.mainbody: '''Azazabus''' was a [[wizard]] and evil overlord in the [[Dalelands]] at some point prior to the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He had a small home in [[Mount Dread]], and a library there too.
document_data.Activities: He ruled over and worked with a number of monsters.
document_data.History: Centuries prior to the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Azazabus built himself a home under Mount Dread, attracting many kinds of monsters to work with and serve him. For years, the monsters raided the surface, while he worked underground on secret experiments. Then, at some point, he simply disappeared, leaving the place to the monsters.
